entry.title: Assigned objects in QM01/QM02
entry.content:
Hello People,

I'm trying to create a custom object category Material(ZMA ), I had followed every step. i.e define object category, implementing BAdi(BADI_QNAO_OBJCAT) and the configuring for a notification type.I have also added Material and Materail Description in Include QNAOS_OBJ_DATA_BATCH_UI of structure QNAOS_OBJ_DATA_UI. 

But Material and Material Description columns not being displayed in assigned objects tab.

I want to display as in below screenshot next to SLED/BBD

Please find the screenshot.

entry.title: how to read RSTXT-TXLINE field
entry.content:
Hi,

inside the RIAFRU20 report enanchment I have to read the RSTXT-TXLINE field 

 

I have already tried the FM READ_TEXT but it wants the "Name" as input, I don't know the "Name" inside the enhancement 

how can i do?

entry.title: Unable to get values in ABAP CDS -Vendor withholding tax amount (BSAK-SKFBT, BSEG-QSSHB)
entry.content:
Hello All,

I am trying to get the vendor withholding Tax base amount for vendors and need to report by vendor, with Ac doc #, correspodning clearing doc# etc. When I build a query/sql in the SQL COnsole I am able to get the values exactly matching to the SAP Screen data form BSAK-SKFBT or BSEG-QSSHB fields. But when I build as a ABAP CDS view these fields are not accesible or available for the CDS View output. 

I understand BSAK, BSIK, BSEG and KPF are all views in S4 HANA. Any otehr options or tables that I can use to derive the data?

Thanks for your help in advance.

Arthur.

entry.title: how to read fields of structures
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

inside a custom report, I need to read some fields that are present in these structures:

 

AFVGD
AFRUD
CAUFVD
VIQMFE
RIWO00
VIQMUR

 

since they are structures, I can't do a Select, are there tables that I can use that are connected to these structures? Or are there Function Modules?


Thank you!

entry.title: How to get preceeding order number with BAPI_DELIVERY_GETLIST
entry.content: I m using BAPI_DELIVERY_GETLIST inputting delivery no to read delivery details, in document flow parameter I m only getting succeeding document details of delivery, here I need preceeding order number in document flow, can someone help on which parameter to pass to get order details in document flow

entry.title: We have DUMP after applying NFE 4.0 notes
entry.content:
We are applying notes in the environment, updating to NFe 4.0.

We encountered this DUMP, is there a correction note available?

How can we resolve this?

Best regards!

entry.title: Global Class Static Attribute
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am facing a challenge in accessing the value stored in the static attribute of a global class. Please refer to the scenario below.

We are creating a Sales order from an Inbound IDOC using standard message type ORDERS. 

I have activated customer exit EXIT_SAPLVEDA_001 (VEDA0001) where I am filling the static attribute of a custom global class. 

I want to retrieve the value of this static attribute in USER_EXIT_SAVE_DOCUMENT. But when I check this attribute in user exit it is blank. 

What might be the reason for it?

 I don't want to use Memory ID, is there any other approach?

entry.title: Email triggered by SOST adds a prefix to link
entry.content:
I'm sending and email by SOST which has a link to its body in this pattern:

|<a href='https://sample.site.com.br/ '> https://sample.site.com.br/</a> | 

However, when I open this email message and click on this link by SOST or email box, it has a kind of SAP HTML Viewer prefix:

saphtmlp://htmlviewer.sap.com/mVBy5V6l7k{ltUSr8nfZYk/' https://sample.site.com.br/ '

Do you know where can I configure it in order to remove this HTML Viewer link?

 saphtmlp://htmlviewer.sap.com/mVBy5V6l7k{ltUSr8nfZYk/' '

entry.title: Enhancement in Confirm Production Order Operation (CO11N) application in Public Cloud
entry.content: In the SAP Public Cloud, on the Production Order Confirmation screen (CO11n), we require a feature that allows us to define fields for maintaining the minimum and maximum values for each quantity. It would be helpful if we could click a button to open a sheet, similar to Excel, where these values can be entered. Additionally, we would like to be able to view reports or history for these entries at a later time. Is it possible to implement such an enhancement or customization within the public cloud?                                                                                        Its quite urgent, please help.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Thanks in Advance

entry.title: Enhancement to Update NAST in VA02
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have an output type that is triggered when a custom Z field is updated. This Z field gets updated through a BAPI during the creation of a Post Goods Receipt (PGR) in an STO process. The output sends an email with PO details, which are populated from the updated Z field.

I initially tried using Memory ID to pass the value, but I encountered an issue. When two PGRs are created within a few seconds, the first output picks up the PO value of the second PGR due to the shared nature of Memory IDs. To avoid this, I thought of updating unused fields in the output type instead.

I need an enhancement (user exit or BAdI) to update the output type during the save process in VA02. Could anyone guide me on the best approach or enhancement point to achieve this?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Passing data from one session to another session
entry.content:
Hi,

I need to pass data from one LUW to another in my SAP system. Initially, I tried using Memory ID, but I encountered issues when multiple sessions attempted to update the same Memory ID simultaneously.

In my system, Shared Memory is not allowed, so I am exploring other options. I am considering using a persistence mechanism, but I don’t want to create a custom Z table to store the data.

Is there a way to achieve this using standard SAP features, such as persistent objects, temporary cluster tables, or any other alternatives?

Thanks in advance for your suggestions!

entry.title: Mass SPRO Special Procurement Key config options
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a business requirement to change the Long text for all languages (Goto -> Translation) for Special Procurement Key (Plant & SPK combination).

However the combination records are 6800. Hence manual maintenance is more time consuming. I tried LSMW but it didn't work due to SPRO navigation and scroll.

Tried to debug T460T table and maintain, but the problem is when copied 6800 from excel and pass in table, it shows 13000 records. Means, if an SPK is used by another plant, it will obviously pull that as well. Which we don't want to change.

Hence is there any other option in STD or way to do this change in Mass.

Kindly let me know.

Regards,

Jeffrey

Delivered quantity

Invoiced quantity

entry.title: Custom field in BP customer role remains editable in display mode
entry.content: I have used BDT to include custom field in BP customer role. Field value is retrieved from table and changes are updated back to KNA-ZZFIELD. But the field remains editable in display mode as well. How to control this?

entry.title: Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA
entry.content:
Hi!

  Is there a Equivalent function ‘ENQUEUE_E_DSVAS_TRDIR’ in S4HANA?

    If I needed to lock a table while the program was running, is there a command?

Thanks!

entry.title: Automatic Batch/Serial No Determination in vl01n
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

 

We are automating batch and serial number determination during outbound delivery.

  • Batch should be determined automatically.

  • Serial numbers (received from a third-party system and stored in a custom table) should be assigned automatically when navigating to Extras → Serial Numbers.

For batch determination, I found the exit USEREXIT_BATCH_DETERMINATION.
Could you please suggest which exit or BAdI can be used for automatic serial number assignment?

Is there any Other ways to approach this requirement?

entry.content: While editing the BADI getting this issue. How to solve it

entry.title: Double Periods (". . ") Not Throwing Syntax Error In ABAP.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am practicing ABAP and I have a small doubt regarding syntax.

In my code, I accidentally wrote:  IF sy-subrc = 0.
WRITE: 'Success'.
ENDIF..   

or at any ending statement if i give dot after the dot ( .. ), it gives me no syntax error and successfully activated the program. 

Is this expected behavior in ABAP? Why doesn’t the system flag this as an error?
Would appreciate if someone could clarify the reasoning behind this.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Issue connecting custom form to MES | "Form is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API"
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’m currently working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and we’re facing an issue when trying to connect a form (in this case, a custom one, but we also tested with standard forms) to a custom plant control system (MES system).

When triggering the process, we get the following error message:

“Form: YY1_PP_ETIQUETAFABRICACION is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API.”

see attached screenshot for details:

Stardard FormCustom Form

 

 

 

 

We would like to understand:

  • Are we possibly using the wrong API for this scenario?

  • Is there a way to adapt or convert the form type so that it can be used?

  • Is this limitation expected for forms of this kind in Public Cloud?

Any insights, documentation links, or experiences with similar cases would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best regards,

ASG.

#S4HANACloud #SAPPublicCloud #SAPForms #ABAPCloud #SAPIntegration #SAPAPI #MESIntegration #SAPBTP #BusinessTechnologyPlatform #FormsService #S4HANA #SAPCommunity
